AddFacetToObject.name: AddFacetToObject
AddFacetToObject.description: Adds a new Facet to an object.

ApplySchema.name: ApplySchema
ApplySchema.description:
Copies input published schema into Directory with same name and version as that of
                                                published schema.

AttachObject.name: AttachObject
AttachObject.description: Attaches an existing object to another existing object.

AttachPolicy.name: AttachPolicy
AttachPolicy.description: Attaches a policy object to any other object.

AttachToIndex.name: AttachToIndex
AttachToIndex.description: Attaches the specified object to the specified index.

AttachTypedLink.name: AttachTypedLink
AttachTypedLink.description: Attaches a typed link b/w a source & target object reference.

BatchRead.name: BatchRead
BatchRead.description:
Performs all the read operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchRead
                                                needs to be granted permissions explicitly.

BatchWrite.name: BatchWrite
BatchWrite.description:
Performs all the write operations in a batch. Each individual operation inside BatchWrite
                                                needs to be granted permissions explicitly.

CreateDirectory.name: CreateDirectory
CreateDirectory.description: Creates a Directory by copying the published schema into the directory.

CreateFacet.name: CreateFacet
CreateFacet.description: Creates a new Facet in a schema.

CreateObject.name: CreateObject
CreateObject.description: Creates an object in a Directory.

CreateSchema.name: CreateSchema
CreateSchema.description: Creates a new schema in a development state.

CreateTypedLinkFacet.name: CreateTypedLinkFacet
CreateTypedLinkFacet.description: Creates a new Typed Link facet in a schema.

DeleteDirectory.name: DeleteDirectory
DeleteDirectory.description: Deletes a directory. Only disabled directories can be deleted.

DeleteFacet.name: DeleteFacet
DeleteFacet.description:
Deletes a given Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet will be
                                                deleted.

DeleteObject.name: DeleteObject
DeleteObject.description: Deletes an object and its associated attributes.

DeleteTypedLinkFacet.name: DeleteTypedLinkFacet
DeleteTypedLinkFacet.description:
Deletes a given TypedLink Facet. All attributes and Rules associated with the facet
                                                will be deleted.

DetachFromIndex.name: DetachFromIndex
DetachFromIndex.description: Detaches the specified object from the specified index.

DetachObject.name: DetachObject
DetachObject.description: Detaches a given object from the parent object.

DetachPolicy.name: DetachPolicy
DetachPolicy.description: Detaches a policy from an object.

DetachTypedLink.name: DetachTypedLink
DetachTypedLink.description: Detaches a given typed link b/w given source and target object reference.

GetFacet.name: GetFacet
GetFacet.description: Gets details of the Facet, such as Facet Name, Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType.

GetLinkAttributes.name: GetLinkAttributes
GetLinkAttributes.description: Retrieves attributes that are associated with a typed link.

GetObjectAttributes.name: GetObjectAttributes
GetObjectAttributes.description: Retrieves attributes within a facet that are associated with an object.

GetSchemaAsJson.name: GetSchemaAsJson
GetSchemaAsJson.description: Retrieves a JSON representation of the schema.

GetTypedLinkFacetInformation.name: GetTypedLinkFacetInformation
GetTypedLinkFacetInformation.description: Returns identity attributes order information associated with a given typed link facet.

ListAppliedSchemaArns.name: ListAppliedSchemaArns
ListAppliedSchemaArns.description: Lists schemas applied to a directory.

ListAttachedIndices.name: ListAttachedIndices
ListAttachedIndices.description: Lists indices attached to an object.

ListDevelopmentSchemaArns.name: ListDevelopmentSchemaArns
ListDevelopmentSchemaArns.description: Retrieves the ARNs of schemas in the development state.

ListDirectories.name: ListDirectories
ListDirectories.description: Lists directories created within an account.

ListFacetAttributes.name: ListFacetAttributes
ListFacetAttributes.description: Retrieves attributes attached to the facet.

ListFacetNames.name: ListFacetNames
ListFacetNames.description: Retrieves the names of facets that exist in a schema.

ListIncomingTypedLinks.name: ListIncomingTypedLinks
ListIncomingTypedLinks.description: Returns a paginated list of all incoming TypedLinks for a given object.

ListIndex.name: ListIndex
ListIndex.description: Lists objects attached to the specified index.

ListObjectAttributes.name: ListObjectAttributes
ListObjectAttributes.description: Lists all attributes associated with an object.

ListObjectChildren.name: ListObjectChildren
ListObjectChildren.description: Returns a paginated list of child objects associated with a given object.

ListObjectParentPaths.name: ListObjectParentPaths
ListObjectParentPaths.description:
Retrieves all available parent paths for any object type such as node, leaf node,
                                                policy node, and index node objects.

ListObjectParents.name: ListObjectParents
ListObjectParents.description: Lists parent objects associated with a given object in pagination fashion.

ListObjectPolicies.name: ListObjectPolicies
ListObjectPolicies.description: Returns policies attached to an object in pagination fashion.

ListOutgoingTypedLinks.name: ListOutgoingTypedLinks
ListOutgoingTypedLinks.description: Returns a paginated list of all outgoing TypedLinks for a given object.

ListPolicyAttachments.name: ListPolicyAttachments
ListPolicyAttachments.description: Returns all of the ObjectIdentifiers to which a given policy is attached.

ListTypedLinkFacetAttributes.name: ListTypedLinkFacetAttributes
ListTypedLinkFacetAttributes.description: Returns a paginated list of attributes associated with typed link facet.

ListTypedLinkFacetNames.name: ListTypedLinkFacetNames
ListTypedLinkFacetNames.description: Returns a paginated list of typed link facet names that exist in a schema.

LookupPolicy.name: LookupPolicy
LookupPolicy.description: Lists all policies from the root of the Directory to the object specified.

PublishSchema.name: PublishSchema
PublishSchema.description: Publishes a development schema with a version.

PutSchemaFromJson.name: PutSchemaFromJson
PutSchemaFromJson.description: Allows a schema to be updated using JSON upload. Only available for development schemas.

RemoveFacetFromObject.name: RemoveFacetFromObject
RemoveFacetFromObject.description: Removes the specified facet from the specified object.

UpdateFacet.name: UpdateFacet
UpdateFacet.description: Adds/Updates/Deletes existing Attributes, Rules, or ObjectType of a Facet.

UpdateLinkAttributes.name: UpdateLinkAttributes
UpdateLinkAttributes.description:
Updates a given typed link’s attributes. Attributes to be updated must not contribute
                                                to the typed link’s identity, as defined by its IdentityAttributeOrder.

UpdateSchema.name: UpdateSchema
UpdateSchema.description: Updates the schema name with a new name.

UpdateTypedLinkFacet.name: UpdateTypedLinkFacet
UpdateTypedLinkFacet.description:
Adds/Updates/Deletes existing Attributes, Rules, identity attribute order of a TypedLink
                                                Facet.
